snippet.title: Tower of Babel - no mercy, Nintendo Switch (Official Trailer)
snippet.description:
"Tower of Babel - no mercy" will release on FEBRUARY 21, 2020 in Europe, Australia and America! 
Pre-purchase the game with 10% discount, from February 1st on: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/tower-of-babel-no-mercy-switch/ 

#localmultiplayer #nintendoswitch #towerofbabel #partygames #familyfun

 ***** 

ABOUT TOWER OF BABEL - NO MERCY 

Grab your friends to build a tower. But don't make it fall, or you'll lose! A bit like a digital Jenga... with more explosions and magic tricks!

A perfect game for family nights and parties with your friends!

 https://www.Tower-of-Babel.net/ 

***** 

Tower of Babel - no mercy is a physics tower building game for families and friends. Build a tower together, but beware! Who makes the tower fall loses the game. To spice things up, you can cast magic spells to scupper your opponents moves.

Easy to pick up and endless fun!  Play 3 crazy modes and up to 4 players local or online! 

With alliance games and magic spells combining, it won't be an easy ride. Tower of Babel is a game that cements friendships and breaks towers... or the other way around :)


***** 

For press and information:
contact(at)dna-studios.ch

Website: http://tower-of-babel.net
Presskit : https://presskit.tower-of-babel.net/sheet.php?p=tower_of_babel
Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/the.babs.games
Developers website: http://www.dna-studios.ch
